for  committing 
the 
in 
the  High  Court  of  Colombo  on  22106/2004,
On or about 07/01/2003,  at Forbes Lane,  did posses 6.4 grams of Diacetyl
Morphine  (heroin),  an  offence  punishable  under  Section  54  (A)  (d)  of
Poison,  Opium and Dangerous Drugs Act No.  13  of 1984 (as amended).
In  the  course  of the  same  transaction  trafficked  in  6.4  grams  of Diacetyl
Morphine  (heroin),  an  offence  punishable  under  Section  54  (A)  (b)  of
Poison, Opium and Dangerous Drugs Act No.  13  of 1984 (as amended).
